txt.en:
'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have come back from Caivád Sâr. They have seen a fortress of Angmarim and banners of the Iron Crown hung from every wall! Had my scouts more time, they would have disrupted the Angmarim there. Instead, they came across three terrible wardens who guard the tower's walls.

'Caivád Sâr is a deadly fortress and is not a place to tread lightly!'
Your mission is to defeat the wardens of Caivád Sâr.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel to Caivád Sâr.
The monster commander in this mission has an aura that buffs any allies nearby.
You have been tasked with defeating the wardens of Caivád Sâr.
DNT - 'When you are ready, my scouts will lead you to TBD.'
'Well done! With the three wardens finally defeated, we should be able to launch an assault against Caivád Sâr soon enough!'
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!
Far from Angmar, the last stronghold of the Iron Crown keeps watch over Elderslade for the forces of Gundabad….\n\nYour mission is to defeat the wardens of Caivád Sâr.
